law.catch_line: To qualify for supervision and examination, the applicant shall satisfy the Commissioner that the ap...
law.text:
To qualify for supervision and examination, the applicant shall satisfy the Commissioner that the applicant:
Is trustworthy and reputable;
Has a good business reputation; and
Has sufficient business experience, moral character, financial responsibility, and genuine fitness to:
Command the confidence of the public; and
Warrant the belief that the business will be operated lawfully, honestly, fairly and efficiently.
